# RGGB-Position(0:RGGB, 1:GBRG) Base-Noise-Reduction(0:Off, 1:On) Black Saturation
# rawRGB Relative Sensitivity, CIE-D50, CIE-A
# sRGB CIE-D50 Color Matrix
# sRGB CIE-A Color Matrix
